nodes.text: The Febrini system was located in the Gateworlds, an area of the Hapes Cluster in the Slice portion of the Inner Rim. It was connected by the hyperlane known as the Rynmar Trail to the Sargon system of the Gateworlds and to the Rynmar system in the Hapan Rim Worlds, and another hyperspace route linked it to the Gateworlds' Zadaria system. The Febrini system was home to the creatures known as Febrini sand-prestors.
The Febrini system was introduced in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square O-9.
